about_the_game:
This game is a simple probability game where the player generates a 30-digit binary number (composed of 0s and 1s) randomly, and wins if all digits are either 0 or 1.

Game Objective

The player clicks a button to generate a 30-digit number randomly. If the generated number consists entirely of 0s or entirely of 1s, the player wins and can see a victory message. Otherwise, they must try again.

Features of the Game

  • Randomness: Each digit has a 50% chance of being 0 or 1, making the outcome purely random.

  • Extremely Low Winning Probability: The probability of generating a 30-digit number with all identical digits (either all 0s or all 1s) is extremely low. The winning probability is approximately 0.0000001862%, which is significantly lower than the odds of winning a lottery jackpot.

  • Simple Interface: Players can start the game by clicking a button, and the game state is displayed on the UI for an intuitive experience.

Game Rules

  • When the game starts, a 30-digit number is generated randomly.

  • The generated number is displayed on the screen, and the game checks whether it meets the winning condition.

  • The winning condition is as follows:

    • All digits are 0, or

    • All digits are 1

  • If the condition is met, a victory message is shown; otherwise, a losing message is displayed along with the generated number.

  • The player can attempt as many times as they wish.

Fun Elements of the Game

  • Luck-Based Gameplay: The outcome is determined solely by luck, making every attempt unpredictable.

  • Challenge: The extremely low probability of winning makes achieving victory very satisfying.

  • Simple Controls: The game can be started with a single click, making it accessible to everyone.

This game is a casual experience meant to be enjoyed in short bursts, providing players with the thrill of trying their luck and the excitement of potentially achieving victory against overwhelming odds.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-4100 (equivalent performance)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti, or AMD Radeon HD 7750 (equivalent performance)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 or AMD FX-6300 (equivalent performance)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 260X (equivalent performance)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (4th generation or newer) or Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics or Apple M1 GPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12.0 (Monterey) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (6th generation or newer) or Apple M1 Pro/Max/Ultra
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5500M, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Binary Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-4100 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti, or AMD Radeon HD 7750 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 or AMD FX-6300 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 260X (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This is a simple luck-based game where players generate a random 30-digit binary number. The goal is to win by having all digits be either 0s or 1s. With extremely low odds of success, the game offers a fun challenge and a sense of achievement when winning.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Dutch, Norwegian, Danish, Russian, Romanian, Vietnamese, Bulgarian, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Arabic, Ukrainian, Indonesian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Finnish, Korean, Hungarian, Galician, Gujarati, K'iche', Nepali, Dari, Latvian, Luxembourgish, Lithuanian, Marathi, Maori, Macedonian, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Mongolian, Basque, Valencian, Bangla, Belarusian, Bosnian, Serbian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Scots, Slovak, Slovenian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Armenian, Assamese, Icelandic, Irish, Azerbaijani, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Estonian, Odia, Yoruba, Urdu, Uzbek, Welsh, Uyghur, Wolof, Igbo, Georgian, Zulu, Cherokee, Tswana, Kazakh, Catalan, Kannada, Quechua, Xhosa, Konkani, Croatian, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Kyrgyz, Tamil, Tajik, Tatar, Telugu, Turkmen, Tigrinya, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Filipino, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi
